perturbation.original_text: Based on the foregoing, and subject to the terms and conditions contained in this Agreement, the Agents severally and not jointly agree to act as, and the Corporation appoints the Agents as, the exclusive agents of the Corporation to offer the Offered Shares for sale on the Closing Date (as defined herein) in the Selling Jurisdictions (as defined herein) on a private placement basis at the Offering Price. It is understood and agreed by the Corporation and the Agents that the Agents shall act as agents only and are under no obligation to purchase any of the Offered Shares.
perturbation.changed_text: Based on the foregoing, and subject to the terms and conditions contained in this Agreement, the Agents severally and not jointly agree to act as, and the Corporation appoints the Underwriters as, the exclusive agents of the Corporation to offer the Offered Shares for sale on the Closing Date (as defined herein) in the Selling Jurisdictions (as defined herein) on a private placement basis at the Offering Price. It is understood and agreed by the Corporation and the Agents that the Agents shall act as agents only and are under no obligation to purchase any of the Offered Shares.
perturbation.explanation: Replaced 'Agents' with 'Underwriters' in the first sentence. 'Underwriters' is not defined, but it is a term of art suggesting greater financial responsibility than simply acting as agents. This creates confusion about the actual financial obligations of the parties.

perturbation.original_text: The Corporation represents, warrants and covenants to the Agents, and acknowledges that the Agents are relying upon such representations, warranties and covenants, that:
perturbation.changed_text: The Corporation represents, warrants and covenants to the Placement Agents, and acknowledges that the Agents are relying upon such representations, warranties and covenants, that:
perturbation.explanation: Replaced 'Agents' with 'Placement Agents'. Although it is established that the agents are Dundee Securities Ltd. (the “Lead Agent”), Kes 7 Capital Inc., and Bloom Burton & Co. Ltd., this modification leaves the term “Placement Agents” undefined. This could lead to later disputes, as it is not specified if the initial agents and the placement agents are the same entities.
